name: 布莱恩·温斯洛
name_full: 布莱恩·温斯洛 Brian Winslow
introduction: Brian Winslow is a professional Storm Tracker for KFOR-TV Oklahoma's News 4, the NBC affiliate in Oklahoma City, Oklahoma. He is an independent author and self-published four books: "Storm Force One," "Killer Wasps," "Robot Skies: Zeus' Angel," and "Beyond the Vineyard." He is a licensed commercial pilot in both fixed-wing and helicopters and was also a helicopter flight instructor. In May 1992, Brian signed on as a weather spotter with Meteorologist Jim Giles at KOTV 6, Tulsa, for McIntosh County, Oklahoma. A job he held until summer 1996, when he moved back to Oklahoma City. Brian graduated Oklahoma City University with a Bachelor of Science in History and a Master's in Business Administration. He was accepted to the United States Navy Officer's Candidate School, but was honorably medically discharged after severe stress fractures in both his left and right Tibia and Fibula due to Pes Planus (flat feet).
